pages.text: Coupled usage of doors, fence gates, and trapdoors$(li)Double doors (with opposing hinges) will open together$(li)Vertically stacked fence gates will open together when used$(li)All trapdoors (and opposing counterparts) along their side axes will open together when used$(li)Any redstone signal above 7 (50%) will power all coupled blocks, whereas anything less will only power the immediate block.
